item.title: The Maven
item.description: To Rafael, whose birthday gathering was held in Baltimore at Poe's Grave, and to Jill, inspiring a topic rhyming with "

item.title: Upon Consideration of the Material in Chapter 4
item.description: The alpha glycocidic bond is feeling very down, While the beta glycocidic bond is up, about the town And bonding glucose as they do, they form disaccharides, And fiber, glycogen, and more (with some just for the ride).

item.title: Ranch Hands
item.description: Ranch hands Big plans Clear streams Big dreams Farmland So grand!

item.title: Ode to Marc Sobel
item.description: The choices are stark All our efforts are noble But a prize go to Marc-- That's: Mr.

item.title: Water Fasting (or, Not So Fast)
item.description: Her stomach has contracted Her malaise is long protracted And her words have been redacted They're not fitting for young ears.
